mapper.select: select a.* from tb_role a ,tb_user b, tb_user_role c where a.id=c.role_id and b.id=c.user_id and b.username=#{username}

select d.* from tb_role a ,tb_user b, tb_user_role c , tb_permission d, tb_role_permission e where a.id=c.role_id and b.id=c.user_id and a.id=e.role_id and d.id=e.permission_id and b.username=#{username}
